title: 12/08/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 12/08/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Pitt QB and Heisman finalist Kenny Pickett about his fake slide in the ACC title game and whether he's going to play in the Peach Bowl. NFL Network's Peter Schrager discusses who he thinks will go 1st overall in next year's NFL draft. And we get to the bottom of Heisman-gate. Was the key found? Is the Trophy safe?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
